content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hello and welcome on board! Weâ€™re delighted that you are joining our terrific EPAM Cerner team! \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We hope you are ready to fall in love with your new job and meet your new colleagues, and to make it a success we prepared helpful guidance that we believe will help you get onboarded faster and smoother. \\rThis is the general account onboarding module which will walk you through the healthcare domain specifics, customer background, account structure and some specific guidance about how to get onboarded. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We hope you have an amazing time working with us!\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":99482,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7663c63e-d14d-4de0-8f11-f8e3521c480c/Cerner Welcome Banner.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7663c63e-d14d-4de0-8f11-f8e3521c480c/Cerner Welcome Banner.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Cerner Welcome Banner.jpg\",\"name\":\"Cerner Welcome Banner.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7663c63e-d14d-4de0-8f11-f8e3521c480c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":639,\"height\":333},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
